entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ulukhaktok Airport 08:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -17.1°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -19.7°C
Wind: E 62 km/h gust 75 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this afternoon then light snow and blowing snow. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
